basics.name: Espen
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: A native of Tønsberg, Norway, Espen Moe pursued a career in software development after graduating. He has primarily worked within enterprise retail solutions and integrations for these.

highlights: In Extenda Retail (previously Visma Retail), Espen has developed customized solutions and integrations for our clients. He also acted as our department's liaison between the Norwegian- and Kyiv-based office. Some noteworthy highlights include PickAndCollect (full stack development), the pharmacy-oriented Order Handling System (full stack development), notification services for Norgesgruppen's PickAndCollect solution (lead developer), Norgesgruppen's FlaxAdmin solution (lead developer), and NG's Scan&Go project (lead developer on integrations between on-prem and cloud-based solutions).

courses: Desktop application development in Java and C#
Object oriented analysis and design with UML

references.name: Carsten Af Geijerstam
references.reference: Team leader at Extenda Retail Common Development & Architecture
